channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.20 (Build 20260126.1)
item.description:
What's New

refactor: Remove unused AX queries for macro standalone checking

  • Remove getTextBeforeCursor, isMacroStandalone functions from CharacterInjector
  • Remove getWordBeforeCursorCallback and isMacroStandaloneCallback from Engine
  • Clean up related code in VNEngine.swift and KeyboardEventHandler.swift
  • Bump build version to 20260126.1

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
